CO-MANAGER

SUMMARY

Seeking a management position that utilizes my strong experience and skills to achieve an organization's sales and profit goals Well — organized , detail-oriented individual who manages a high volume workload within a deadline driven environment Expertise in establishing priorities and coordinating work assignments to control and maximize productivity Skilled at working harmoniously with associates and resolving minor personnel problems Experience in staff performance evaluation and the creation/implementation of procedural changes to improve the quality of the workforce Outstanding customer service skills with focus on achieving top levels of customer satisfaction Skilled in use of MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power Point; bilingual in French and Creole

<JD_START>
Job Title: Mechanic Associate

Location: Riverside, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Pacific Region Job Description

 

Job Title: Associate Mechanic

Department: Fleet

Status: Full Time

Reports To:Fleet Manager

Summary

Entry level position. Performs light duty repairs on AMR fleet vehicles, assist senior mechanics and provides logistical support as assigned.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

Performs Light mechanical and electrical repairs on AMR vehicles.Responds to vehicle breakdowns in the field when requested.Provides logistical support for the department.Assists Front Line Mechanics as needed.Operates company vehicles in accordance with company policy and safe practices. Completes all required paperwork and documentation neatly, correctly, and on time using AMR repair orders.Uses maintenance data base to document all completed tasks / job assignments.Attend all mandatory Fleet related training.Performs all other duties as requested by Fleet Manager.

Principal Accountabilities

Vehicles repaired correctly and in a timely fashion.Responds to changing departmental priorities.Quickly respond, diagnose and repair vehicles during road call situations.Maintain safe and clean work area.Documentation complete and neat.Accurately account for all parts and materials.Maintain good working relationship with all personnel and professional conduct with outside contacts.Excellent customer service skills.

Safety

Takes responsibility for and demonstrates safe work practices.Adheres to organization and OSHA safety guidelines.Identifies and reports safety problems.Adheres to Fleet policies and procedures.

Essential Equipment Used

TelephoneComputer SkillsPersonal hand toolsVehicle Shop Equipment:Vehicle Hoist / Floor JacksDiagnostic Scan ToolsPneumatic air toolsTire Mounting MachineTire Balancer Hand Tools 

Qualifications

Ability to prioritize multiple tasks.Ability to work with limited supervision and as a team member.Ability to employ discretion and confidentiality in sensitive areas.Ability to read, interpret, and follow instructions on memos, letters, various documents and repair manuals.Ability to perform the essential job functions.Regular and predictable attendance.2 years of basic automotive experience or vocational training.Must have a basic set of personal tools.Must have a current valid driver’s license.Must have a high school diploma, or equivalent education.

Click Here For Full Job Description

Why Choose AMR? AMR is one of Global Medical Response’s (GMR) family of solutions. Our GMR teams deliver compassionate, quality medical care, primarily in the areas of emergency and patient relocation services. View the stories on how our employees provide care to the world at www.AtaMomentsNotice.com. Learn how our values are at the core of our services and vital to how we approach care, and check out our comprehensive benefit options at GlobalMedicalResponse.com/Careers.

EEO Statement

Global Medical Response and its family of companies are an Equal Opportunity Employer, which includes supporting veterans and providing reasonable accommodations for individuals with a disability.

Company Benefits: Check out our careers site benefits page to learn more about our benefit options.

Salary Range: $32.00 - $40.00 DOE (This rate applies to 8 hour shift and average 40 per week)

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
